bannerContent.mainParagraph: Today Universal Group QSC is a reliable partner of government institutions, oil and gas industry, construction and shipping sectors. Behind the major projects of our 150+ active corporate clients stands our strength, agility and flawless service model.
bannerContent.paragraph1: Our company has been operating under the name "Universal Pro" since 2016. Thanks to the experience and international relations gained over many years, we have become one of the leading supply companies in the country.
bannerContent.paragraph2: Our company, which operates on a large scale in the B2B and B2G segments, works with more than 1,200 international suppliers and has a wide product portfolio. 70% of the supply is from abroad and 30% from the local market.
bannerContent.mainParagraph1: Founded in 1998 as "Universal Makina," Universal Group began its operations as the official distributor for prestigious brands such as Bosch, Saint Gobain, Klingspor, Telwin, Jotun, ESAB, Çağsan, Lincoln Electric, and Rockwool. In 2013, the company rebranded to "Universal Group" and expanded its operations in the B2B/B2G segments.
bannerContent.mainParagraph2: Today, Universal Group collaborates with over 1,200 international suppliers, offering a wide product portfolio sourced from both domestic and foreign markets—70% from abroad and 30% locally. Depending on project needs, the company delivers products from manufacturing sites, ports, or directly to the job site. The company distinguishes itself with a "flawless service model," taking full responsibility for the entire supply process. We ensure that our customers receive the highest quality products and services, meeting their needs at the highest level.
bannerContent.mainParagraph3: Currently, Universal Group is a trusted partner for over 150 corporate clients in the government, oil and gas, construction, and shipping sectors.

azlift.mainText: SINCE 2012, WE HAVE STARTED WITH RENT AND SALES OF LIFTING EQUIPMENT AND AERIAL WORKING PLATFORMS.
azlift.description1: Azlift company is engaged in the service, rental and sale of lifting and loading platforms, construction equipment for construction projects, indoor and outdoor work areas, warehouses, logistics centers, etc. Based on many years of experience, our rental manager visits you on site if necessary, and advises you on exactly what you need, not just the equipment in the product list.
azlift.description2: Our company has made a name for itself in this field many times by providing great support to large-scale projects within Azerbaijan, such as AZFEN LLC, Lachin Airport project, Shusha tunnel, Kalbajar Hot Water Plant, conference halls in Kalbajar and Zangilan, construction of social houses in Jabrayil district, alternative energy sources in Gobustan. Our product portfolio includes electric and diesel powered scissor, telescopic, articulated, etc. personnel lifting platforms as well as warehouse equipment such as autocarts, cranes, excavators, bulldozers, hydraulic lifts and loaders.
